references.paper_title: Neural message passing for quantum chemistry
references.reason: This paper introduces a neural message passing architecture which is foundational to many modern molecular property prediction methods

references.paper_title: Moleculenet: a benchmark for molecular machine learning
references.reason: This paper introduces a benchmark dataset, MoleculeNet, which is widely used for evaluating molecular machine learning models and is crucial for the results presented in this paper

references.paper_title: Biological structure and function emerge from scaling unsupervised learning to 250 million protein sequences
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the power of self-supervised learning for molecular representation, motivating the pretraining stage in this paper's proposed method

references.paper_title: Geometry-enhanced molecular representation learning for property prediction
references.reason: This paper introduces a method for enhancing molecular representation learning by incorporating geometric information, which is closely related to the research topic and results of this paper

references.paper_title: Molecular contrastive learning of representations via graph neural networks
references.reason: This paper proposes a contrastive learning approach for molecular representation learning, providing another relevant method in the field and context for this paper
